duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively maintain customer relationship and revenue by managing customer's business needs, focusing on retaining and growing the overall customer relationship to meet company goals and objectives.
Work closely with the Account Team and Sales Management to seamlessly service the customers.
Act as the primary post installation contact and liaison between customer and internal partners to ensure strong service and response to customer needs.
Manage account billing, inventory, trouble tickets, SLA, and credit inquiries with internal groups and work with customer on any service related issues.
Provide and review service inventories, scorecards, customized reports, and performance metrics via business review meetings with customer.
Onboard customers to the business portal and drive renewal negotiations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience in Business, Sales, or related field preferred
